cs.IT, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SI, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with distributed storage systems, which are typically studied in the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Distributed Computing (cs.DC) sub-categories. The paper also discusses the tradeoff between storage per node and repair bandwidth, which is a common topic in Networked Information Systems (cs.NI) and Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper proposes a new model for distributed storage systems, which could fall under the Systems and Information Theory (cs.SI) sub-category.
